channel.title: CVE Feed for 4MOSAn -- GCB Doctor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 4MOSAn -- GCB Doctor

item.title: CVE-2021-42338|2024-09-17T00:21:46.974Z -- 4mosan -- gcb%20doctor
item.description: 4MOSAn GCB Doctor’s login page has improper validation of Cookie, which allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to bypass authentication by code injection in cookie, and arbitrarily manipulate the system or interrupt services by upload and execution of arbitrary files.

item.title: CVE-2021-44159|2024-09-17T00:11:07.348Z -- 4mosan -- gcb%20doctor
item.description: 4MOSAn GCB Doctor’s file upload function has improper user privilege control. A remote attacker can upload arbitrary files including webshell files without authentication and execute arbitrary code in order to perform arbitrary system operations or deny of service attack.
